com.scottescue.dropwizard.entitymanager

Class ScanningEntityManagerBundle<T extends io.dropwizard.Configuration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scottescue.dropwizard.entitymanager.EntityManagerBundle<T>
      • com.scottescue.dropwizard.entitymanager.ScanningEntityManagerBundle<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the Configuration type expected by this bundle
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.dropwizard.ConfiguredBundle<T>, io.dropwizard.db.DatabaseConfiguration<T>

    public abstract class ScanningEntityManagerBundle<T extends io.dropwizard.Configuration>
extends EntityManagerBundle<T>
    Extension of EntityManagerBundle that scans a given package for entities instead of requiring entities to be explicitly listed.

        Parameters:
